group_1.textRight: So you made this scarf yourself?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, when I was in elementary school.

group_1.textRight: Wait, that's weird... Why's it wider in some@places than it is in others?

group_1.textLeft: It was the first thing I ever knitted.@I'm sure I could do better now.

group_1.textRight: I think it looks beautiful!
It's proof that Yachiyo's always been great@with her hands!
Even if you think it's not very good...
I can tell that it's warm and cozy,@and was made with love.
And those are the most important things@for a scarf.
But you said you worked hard on it, didn't you?
I can sense the feelings you wove into it.
Wait...
If it was a gift for your parents, why is it here?

group_1.textLeft: We'll need to go all the way back@to the beginning...

group_1.narration: "My parents moved a lot because of their jobs."
"Before I became a Magical Girl,@we stayed in places all over the country."
"I enjoyed getting to live with my parents."
"But because I switched schools so often,@it was hard to make friends."
"After I started working as a model,@I began living with my grandma in Kamihama,@since it was closer to the modeling agency."
"That was how I first arrived at Mikazuki Villa."

group_1.textLeft: *Sniffle* Yachiyo... I'd feel much better if you@stayed with me instead.

group_1.textRight: But you already told me this was okay.
And Grandma's here.@It's not like I'm living alone.

group_1.textLeft: But to just drop you off in a new town...
I'd like to stay with you until you're@done moving in, at least.

group_1.textRight: This isn't exactly the first time you've dropped@me off in a new town.
And you have to get back to work, don't you?
If you don't go back today, you and Dad will@both get in trouble.

group_1.textLeft: Well... If we drove through the night, we might@be able to get home by morning...

group_1.textRight: That sounds dangerous.
Driving at night is risky...
I'm fine, so you can head out!

group_1.textLeft: But if you need anything, just tell us, okay?
We'll be sure to call you every day.

group_1.textRight: You and Dad are both busy.@Don't let me distract you from your work.
...Just call every weekend or so.
I'll take good care of Yachiyo.
Drive safe, you two!

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* Took them long enough to leave.

group_1.narration: "Back then, I didn't want my parents to worry,@so I tried to act more mature than I was."

group_1.textRight: How about we head inside and start getting@dinner ready?

group_1.narration: "I think everyone could tell that@I was just pretending to be tough."
